CanvasRenderingContext2DCreateConicGradi.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.createConicGradient() method of the Canvas 2D API creates a gradient around a point with given coordinates.

remarks.para: This method returns a conic . To be applied to a shape, the gradient must first be assigned to the or properties.

blockquote.para: Note: Gradient coordinates are global, i.e., relative to the current coordinate space. When applied to a shape, the coordinates are NOT relative to the shape's coordinates.
